$WmMPID_アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Normal,Face|We've got a lot of blue army recruits
here. Looks like we can get it done.$k$p$WmMPID_セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Normal,Face|I struggle to see how Ike and I ended
up on opposing squads, but the terms
of the assignment must be observed.$k$p$WmMPID_ティアマト,ch09_04_Tiamat_F_Normal,Face|Red army, are you ready? Those who
neglect their training fall first! Fight
like this is a battle for your very life!$k$p
